Program_Policies: For the minor in Electrochemical Engineering, a minimum of 35 credits is required.; A grade of C or better is required for all courses in the minor, as specified by Senate Policy 59-10. In addition, at least six credits of the minor must be unique from the prescribed courses required by a student's major(s).
